content: this pattern is also available on my website here 1 learn how to crochet the harvest stitch and work up the harvest stitch crochet baby blanket this one-row repeat pattern produces a lacy fabric with great drape this is a lovely in-between season blanket because you have some lacy holes but the yarn used in this blanket furls wander is a nice and dense yarn the color of this yarn is called thatch which to me paired perfectly with the harvest stitch the blanket is framed with a thick simple single_crochet border all around for a structured finish i think the simplicity of the border makes those puff stitches in the body of the blanket really pop i hope you enjoy this pattern this pattern was designed in collaboration with furls crochet for the furls crochet blog hop 2025 check out the rest of the lovely free patterns here https //furlscrochet com/blogs/everything-else thank you so much to furls crochet for providing the wander yarn and streamline metal hook for this
